DOC.detailed_description: Four hundred consent treatment drug court participant randomly assign either HIV intervention group ( n = 200 ) attention control group . All client attend regularly schedule status hearing schedule approximately every six week . Clients HIV intervention group receive brief computerize , self-administered HIV risk reduction intervention follow first three status hearing . Clients attention control condition view series educational life-skill video match length follow first three status hearing . The primary outcome engagement high risk behavior measure Risk Assessment Battery ( RAB ) . Secondary HIV-related outcome include : ( 1 ) rate HIV testing , ( 2 ) condom procurement , ( 3 ) self-reported condom use . Tertiary outcomes related treatment court compliance include : ( 1 ) drug court graduation , ( 2 ) urinalysis-confirmed drug abstinence , ( 3 ) case management attendance , ( 4 ) satisfaction case management . In addition , conduct preliminary cost cost-effectiveness analysis delivery brief computerize HIV intervention . Assessments conducted baseline 9- 15-months post admission .
